articles.title: Athena Moon Lander Beams Back Stunning Images Of Earth From Space - The Daily Galaxy --Great Discoveries Channel
articles.description: A private lunar lander, Athena, has captured stunning images of Earth just hours after launch, marking the start of a groundbreaking mission to explore the Moon’s south pole. But beyond the breathtaking views, what cutting-edge technology is Athena bringing t…
articles.content: A private lunar lander, Athena, has sent back breathtaking images of Earth from space, capturing a unique view of our planet shortly after its launch. Built by Intuitive Machines, the lander lifted o… [+3400 chars]
